name: Broodmother
description:
Survive, lay eggs and get that juicy highscore!

Skills:

Spacebar = Dodge roll
(fast forward and invulnerable while rolling)

Left Mouse Button = Teleport

When unlocked:

Q - Lay egg 
(hatches assigned creature)
E - Lay egg 
(hatches assigned creature)

Your children will help you!

Monsters drop blood (Score), Meat (resource to lay new eggs) and powerups!
Powerups can be assigned in the 2 skill slots Q and E.

Health bar:

If your health is 0 the Broodmother dies... And molds into a new egg.
Spawn again by double clicking.

Energy Bar:

Energy is consumed by giving birth. You gain energy from Meat.

The Broodmother can never truly die...
It's stuck in a loop.
